alert.note: Alert for Dallas; Madison; Polk; Warren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 05 at 1:10PM CST by NWS DesMoines
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Polk, northeastern Madison, southeastern Dallas and northwestern Warren Counties through 145 PM CST... At 110 PM CST, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Winterset, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Norwalk, Des Moines Int`l Airport, Valley West Mall and Jordan Creek Town Center around 125 PM CST. West Des Moines, Johnston, Clive, Windsor Heights, Drake Stadium And Knapp Center, Iowa Events Center, Principal Park, Merle Hay Mall and Southridge Mall around 130 PM CST. Other locations in the path of this storm include Des Moines, Ankeny, Pleasant Hill, Saylorville, Iowa State Fairgrounds, Altoona, Bondurant, Prairie Meadows and Adventureland Amusement Park. This includes the following highways... Interstate 35 between mile markers 54 and 72, and between mile markers 87 and 94. Interstate 80 between mile markers 114 and 146. Interstate 235 between mile markers 1 and 14. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
